card.title: WHAT WE DO
card.subtitle: India celebrates Exploration
card.content:
Indian Media Syndicate strives to be the global leader in Exploration, Scientific Communications, Real Life Entertainment, serving passionate Explorers around the world with scientific journalism that inspires, informs and entertains.

This is an Indian family of informational, educational and entertainment-oriented Television, Applications and Websites offering value to how Education is developed and accessed by Indic Societies.

elements.title: OUR MISSION
elements.subtitle: To Revolutionize Indian Media
elements.content: By making every Information, every Discovery, every Invention, every Challenge accessible to every person in the India pacific Region

card.title: ABOUT US
card.subtitle: Making Knowledge Accessible to All.
card.content: Each control has been designed for multiple use, several administrators will be able to assign content remotely from their mobile phones, without any worries.

elements.comment: “Indian Media Syndicate is a Revolution. It's Greater than Microsoft and Apple combined. I wish I could work with them.”
“I am very fortunate that I was the Prime Minister of India when Indian Media Syndicate went live. I wish I could transfer my position for the CEO post.”
“In IMS's India France, will invest more than 10 times the current trade value. I am considering to apply for an Indian citizenship.”
“Indian Media Syndicate is Bigger than Tesla and SpaceX combined. I dropped my Twitter shares to be a part of IMS. I am also considering the same name for my next kid.”
